summary: Frontend testing completed for Fear Meter v1.0 major update. All 9 requested features are working correctly: Disclaimer modal on first visit, Sound toggle in menu, Fear Library with all 4 tabs (Movies/Games/Attractions/Ranking), clinical color palette (#8E0E1C), and footer disclaimers.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns (contexts, hooks, components)
Clinical color palette (#8E0E1C) consistently applied via CSS variables
Sound toggle properly persists to localStorage
Disclaimer modal correctly uses localStorage for persistence
All data is clearly marked as SIMULATED throughout the app
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. This is a frontend-only horror simulation app with all biometric data MOCKED/SIMULATED. Clinical audio system uses Web Audio API for hospital monitor-style beeps.
